description:
Attorney Edward S. Kahn of the Edward S. Kahn Law Offices, LLC, in Trenton, has practiced law since 1980, leading a general practice law firm that emphasizes litigation, personal injury plaintiff and workers' compensation. The firm continues the tradition of the firm of Albert B. Kahn, who began his practice of law in Trenton in 1924.

Mr. Kahn leads the three experienced personal injury plaintiff lawyers in the firm, offering quality representation to clients in practice areas of litigation, personal injury, real estate transactions, divorce proceedings, criminal defense matters, and estate planning and probate. Consultations are offered in English and Spanish.

He received a B.A. from Amherst College in 1969; an M.Ed. from Rutgers in 1974; an Ed.D. from Rutgers in 1980; and a J.D. from Rutgers in 1980. Apart from his practice, he is involved in many community organizations, sits on boards of trustees for several community groups and is a member of various professional associations.

Edward S. Kahn serves workplace accident and personal injury plaintiff clients in Trenton, Lawrenceville and Central New Jersey with integrity and commitment, and is known for his determination and perseverance on behalf of the needs and rights of his clients. Edward S. Kahn Law Offices, LLC is the first and last law firm you will ever need.
